mapper.sql: income_id, income_direction, business_type, trans_type, product_code, settle_status, create_time, creator, update_time, modifier, remark, status
mapper.insert:
insert into settle_income_info
income_id,
income_direction,
business_type,
trans_type,
product_code,
settle_status,
create_time,
creator,
update_time,
modifier,
remark,
status,

mapper.update:
update settle_income_info
income_direction = #{incomeDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_type = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_status = #{settleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where income_id = #{incomeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select income_id, income_direction, business_type, trans_type, product_code, settle_status, create_time, creator, update_time, modifier, remark, status from settle_income_info where status='Y'

select income_id, income_direction, business_type, trans_type, product_code, settle_status, create_time, creator, update_time, modifier, remark, status from settle_income_info where income_id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
